price: Ɔno na Ɔsane nsuo wͻ akyire yi a wͻn aba mu abuo, na Wahwete N’ahummͻborͻ (ama Nenkoa). Ɔne Okyitaafoͻ, Ɔne Ayɛyie Wura no.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا قَنَطُواْ وَيَنشُرُ رَحۡمَتَهُۥۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī yunazzilu al-ghaytha min baʿdi mā qanaṭū wayanshuru raḥmatahu wahuwa al-waliyu al-ḥamīdu
